source: <webtest nameexceltest - structure filter> <config .../> <steps> <invoke urltestExcel.xls/> <compareToExpected saveFilteredtrue readFilteredfalse toFile${expectedFile}> <excelStructureFilter descriptionextract XLS structure/> <lineSeparatorFilter descriptionnormalise line separators/> </compareToExpected> </steps> </webtest>
